translations: 对……厌倦的；充分满足的；生腻的

sentences.sentence: When we gulp down food our stomachs don't have a chance to digest it properly, nor signal to our brains that we are satiated.
sentences.translation: 我们吞下食物的时候，我们的胃没有机会去很好地消化，没有信息传送到我们的大脑，提示我们满足了。

sentences.sentence: Hunger of the mind can be actually satiated through extensive reading.
sentences.translation: 事实上，思想的饥饿可以通过广泛的阅读来满足。
